version_description:
【内容更新】
1.增加了2集漫画故事
2.复习增加新场景和新怪物
【功能优化】
1.主地图优化
2.增加意见反馈功能
3.字库搜索功能优化

1.更新为新春版
2.修复一些小bug

【功能优化】
1.更新为新春版
2.修复一些小bug

1. 可以跳过漫画
2. 解决了在部分型号上静音的问题
3. 解决了部分界面容易误操作的问题
4. 解决了注册时的联网问题
5. 支持系统版本号改为7.0以上

1. 新增5个字的玩环节和50个字的认环节
2. 新增防沉迷功能
3. 新增过关分享
4. 新增复习提醒
5. 新增《宇宙护卫队》两个角色
6.漫画持续更新
7.交互和界面改善

1. 新增5个字的玩环节和50个字的认环节

4. 新增复习提醒

1. 新增"自、己、丁、厂、先"五个字的新游戏
2. 修复了已知bug

1. 新增"自、己、丁、厂、先"五个字的新游戏
2. 修复了已知bug
修复了进入学习环节时的联网问题

1. 新增“耳、牙、心、目、毛”五个字的游戏
2. 优化50个字的“认”环节

1.新“长、方、又、立、弓”5个字的玩环节及50个字的认环节
2.多用户档案切换，支持一个账号下多个宝宝同时使用
3.增加海洋和太空两个地图场景
4.主界面增加帮助按钮
5.增加《宇宙护卫队》中的闪电猴和彩虹兔

1.新“关、贝、书、园、兴”5个字的玩环节及100个字的认环节
2.操作难度调整，更适合低幼孩子
3.UI提示优化
欢迎加入洪恩识字官方Q群：183674145

【新增】“看、见、生、今、空”5个字的玩环节及100个字的认环节
【新增】适合女孩的复习场景
【新增】微信、QQ登录功能
【优化】调整星星的价值
【优化】提升低幼孩子操作体验
欢迎加入洪恩识字官方Q群：183674145

【新增】“兔、公、会、要、走”五个字的游戏
【新增】200个汉字的认环节动画以及一个复习游戏
【新增】游戏主角可有有更多选择
【优化】根据性别、年龄调整游戏类型与难度
欢迎加入洪恩识字官方Q群：183674145

【新增】“红、色、光、明、灯、苗、禾、叶、竹、林”十个字的游戏
【新增】第651-1200个字“认”环节讲解动画
【新增】可根据识字水平，在字库中自主设置跳过已经认识的字
【新增】虎兔猴主角变身动画
【优化】第三方登录绑定手机号
欢迎加入洪恩识字官方Q群：183674145
Issues fixed.

【优化】UI改版，更加简洁易于操作，完美适配iPhoneX
【新增】字库新增“难字歼灭”的功能，未掌握的字可以在这里测试歼灭
【新增】游乐场开关功能，家长可根据需要选择开启或关闭游乐场
【新增】“文、是、把、笑、着、爱、也、可、这、爷”十个字的游戏
【新增】100字之后增加组词的练和测
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

程序猿GG修复了一些小小的bug~~

【优化】用一个程序员换回N台真机，只为完美适配iPhone X；
【新增】“奶、们、球、圆、形”等20个字的互动环节；
【新增】字库“难字歼灭”中用户自选字功能；
【优化】简化注册登录，优化操作逻辑。

洪恩识字全体人员祝大家新年快乐！！！
【新增】“发、衣、他……亮、两”等15个字的互动环节；
【新增】新春UI，过节更喜庆，烟花随便放；
【优化】还有许多你看得见的看不见的优化；
【微信】搜索并关注“洪恩儿童App”,随时随地掌握孩子学习情况。

【新增】“肚、尾、你…...和、岛”等10个字的互动环节；
【新增】两个有趣又好玩的“练”：踢足球、泡泡机；
【优化】还有许多你看得见的看不见的优化。

[New] “Chinese Words Arena” launched to reinforce Chinese learning through fast-paced games
[New] Four new leveled reading storybooks released
[New] A new learning game “Dancing Animals” introduced
[New] “No Skip Mode” added for parents’ choice
[Optimized] More convenient parental control of “Daily Review” function
[Optimized] No presence of icon while “Playground” module closed

[New] “Chinese Words Arena” launched to reinforce Chinese learning through fast-paced games
[New] Four new leveled reading storybooks released
[New] A new learning game “Dancing Animals” introduced
[New] “No Skip Mode” added for parents’ choice
[Optimized] More convenient parental control of “Daily Review” function
[Optimized] No presence of icon while “Playground” module closed

[New] The whole Chinese words learning course divided into three stages - Entry Level, Intermediate Level, Advanced Level.
[New] New theme-based learning approach introduced for the Intermediate Level course, i.e. the words No.201-600.
[New] Six new theme-based learning units and games added, including Monster Hospital, Forest Treehouse, etc.
[New] New function added to lock those words no need to learn.
[New] Reading assistance function added to better support kids’ reading process.
[Optimized] Reduced level of difficulty for the “Chinese Words Arena” with more simplified user experience.

[New] Three new theme-based learning units with fascinating games.
[Optimized] Volume of background music adjusted.
[Optimized] Enhanced experience for the “Chinese Words Arena”.

[New] Learning achievement system to reinforce user motivation.
[New] Easily find graded picture books through the home page.
[New] Four new fun and content rich games.
[Optimized] Refinement of star increase decrease logic in the Chinese character arena.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

[Optimized] Updated interface for the new challenge arena.
[New] Easy access to the notification and activities area.
[New] Added new activity to practice mode.
[New] New games added: Superman Academy, Magic Classroom and Car Assembly.

[New] Character strokes are said aloud as written.
[New] Easily switch between reading modes.
[Optimized] New look, easy to use title page.
[New] Find words quickly with new navigation page.
[Optimized] Review account information more clearly.
[Stay Tuned] See your favorite characters in the 3D animated cartoon, Cosmic Guard, on October 8th. You can watch on Jiajia TV, Cartoon TV, iQiyi, Tencent Video, Mango TV.

[New] Answer function module and increased question quantity；
[New] Confirmation required before making purchases；
[New] Option to receive verification code by voice message；
[New] Notification to alert you when you have been logged out.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

Increased level of challenge in the practice section.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

[New] Cosmic Guard Base: reading, animation, games;
[Optimized] Fixed minor problems with background logic.

[New] Cheaper price structure for Graded Reader packages;
[New] Jump freely between play, recognize, practice, and write sections;
[New] Words not fully learned will appear again for review and consolidation.
[New] Increased control function of the Cosmic Guard Base;
[Optimized] Improved algorithm for the leaderboard.

[New] Cheaper price structure for Graded Reader packages;
[New] Jump freely between play, recognize, practice, and write sections;
[New] Words not fully learned will appear again for review and consolidation.
[New] Increased control function of the Cosmic Guard Base;
[Optimized] Improved algorithm for the leaderboard.

[New]Character Classroom: Introducing character components.
[New]Featured UI for Chinese New Year.
[Optimized]New design of course introduction page.
Best wishes for a happy Chinese New Year!
Optimized course content for smoother learning process.
Fix some bugs and improve user experience.

[New] Task mode to customize and manage daily tasks;
[New] Registration system for non-mainland China users;
[Optimized] Improved interface with new maps and navigation bars;
[Optimized] Improved experience for accessing content.
[Optimized] Minor bug fixes.

[New] Manually manage or replace scenes from the review section according to your needs
[New] Build your own word library to review and master difficult words

[New] Increased sentence practice for more in depth character learning
[Optimized] Daily task improvements including support for creating custom learning objectives
[Optimized] Choose from additional templates to customize your review section
[Optimized] Customize the tricky word library to tailor the learning experience to your specific needs
[Optimized] Upgraded achievement library has new beautiful stickers and rewards for when you complete tasks
[Optimized] Reader access improved for easier use after learning

[New] All books now available through your bookshelf.
[New] Learning and reading report to easily monitor and track progress.
[Optimized] Better login process.
